actionConfiguration.body:
INSERT INTO development_app_schema."refinement" (
	"idea_id",
	"title",
	"author",
	"created",
	"last_updated")
VALUES (
	'{{Ideas_Table.selectedRow.idea_id}}',
	'{{Ideas_Table.selectedRow.title}}',
	'{{appsmith.user.name}}',
	'{{Date.now()}}',
	'{{Date.now()}}');

UPDATE development_app_schema."ideas" SET
		"refinement_created" = True
WHERE "idea_id" = {{Ideas_Table.selectedRow.idea_id}};

WHERE "idea_id" = {{Ideas_Table.selectedRow.idea_id}};
